> hah, well, it is a bug, but if you are playing legitly in the built 
 in campaign, i doubt you could get your str that high anyway :)

I'm pretty sure that almost every character has that bug [there's a 
point when it doesn't cost money to increase the number) for every 
stat but experience level.

For the record, in one guess, you could probably figure out how I got 
the money to buy the limit: one scenario in my torture set.

I've concluded, that for your money, buying strength does more good 
than buying experience levels.

[BTW, are you going to redo the way experience points are handled like 
I suggested: experience level x plus some many experience points?  
That should alleviate some game crashes.]

* * *

Any ideas on how a slime's graphics is tied to its health?  If you use 
the cheat for bringing health up on a slime for a while, its graphics 
will . . not work properly.
